nodes.documentation:
Event is broadcast to the Ethereum blockchain to signify 
that an approval has been made.
nodes.name: Approval

nodes.documentation:
Event is broadcast to the Ethereum blockchain to signify 
that a transfer of tokens has take place.
nodes.name: Transfer

nodes.documentation:
Allows anyone to query the balance of a given address.

    * @param _addr - The address of which the balance is being queried.

    * @return The balance of the address.
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation:
Allows anyone to query the token contract to see how many tokens an owner 
of tokens has allowed a spender to spend from the owner's balance. 

    * @param _owner - The address which the tokens reside in. 
@param _spender - The address of the spender. 

    * @return The total amount of tokens the spender is allowed to spend from
the owner's tokens.
nodes.name: allowance

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "From address does not have enough tokens"

arguments.value: From address does not have enough tokens

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "From address does not have enough tokens"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The recipient address must not be 0x00...00"

arguments.value: The recipient address must not be 0x00...00

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The recipient address must not be 0x00...00"

nodes.name: internalTranfer

nodes.documentation:
Allows token holders to tranfer their tokens to other ETH addresses. 

    * @param _to - The recipient address which will receive the tokens.
@param _value - The total amount of tokens which will be sent.

    * @return True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise.
nodes.name: transfer

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The spender address must not be 0x00...00"

arguments.value: The spender address must not be 0x00...00

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The spender address must not be 0x00...00"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The owner address must not be 0x00..00"

arguments.value: The owner address must not be 0x00..00

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The owner address must not be 0x00..00"

nodes.name: internalApprove

nodes.documentation:
Allows an owner of tokens to approve some spender to spend up 
to a specified amount of tokens from the owner's wallet address. 

    * @param _spender - The address of the spender who will be allowed to 
spend tokens from the owner's wallet address. 
@param _value - The total amount of tokens the owner will allow the 
spender to spend.

    * @return True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise.
nodes.name: approve

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The spender does not have a sufficient allowance"

arguments.value: The spender does not have a sufficient allowance

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The spender does not have a sufficient allowance"

nodes.documentation:
Allows a spender who has been approved by an owner of the token to 
spend tokens from the owner's wallet address. 

    * @param _from - The wallet address of the owner. 
@param _value - The total amount of tokens to transfer. 

    * @return True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise.
nodes.name: transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
Allows the owner of the contract to burn tokens from the total supply 
if and only if the token was declared as a burnable one in the constructor
of the contract. 

    * @param _value - The total amount of tokens to burn. 

    * @return True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise. *
nodes.name: burnTokens

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The recipient address must not be 0x00...00"

arguments.value: The recipient address must not be 0x00...00

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The recipient address must not be 0x00...00"

nodes.documentation:
ALlows the owner of the contract to mint new tokens to any wallet 
address if and only if the token was declared as a mintable one in 
the constructor of the contract. 

     * @param _to - The address of the recipient.

     * @return True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise.
nodes.name: mintTokens

Event is broadcast to the Ethereum blockchain to signify 
that an approval has been made.

that a transfer of tokens has take place.

@param _value - The total amount of tokens to transfer.

nodes.documentation:
Allows the owner of the contract to burn tokens from the total supply 
if and only if the token was declared as a burnable one in the constructor
of the contract. 

    * @param _value - The total amount of tokens to burn. 

    * @return True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise. *
nodes.name: burnTokens

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The recipient address must not be 0x00...00"

arguments.value: The recipient address must not be 0x00...00

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The recipient address must not be 0x00...00"

nodes.documentation:
ALlows the owner of the contract to mint new tokens to any wallet 
address if and only if the token was declared as a mintable one in 
the constructor of the contract. 

     * @param _to - The address of the recipient.

     * @return True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise.
nodes.name: mintTokens

params._owner: - The address which the tokens reside in.

allowance(address,address).return: The total amount of tokens the spender is allowed to spend from the owner's tokens.

params._spender: - The address of the spender who will be allowed to  spend tokens from the owner's wallet address.
params._value: - The total amount of tokens the owner will allow the  spender to spend.

approve(address,uint256).return: True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise.

params._addr: - The address of which the balance is being queried.

params._value: - The total amount of tokens to burn.

burnTokens(uint256).return: True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise. *

params._decimals: - The number of decimals of the token.

mintTokens(address,uint256).return: True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise.

params._to: - The recipient address which will receive the tokens.
params._value: - The total amount of tokens which will be sent.

transfer(address,uint256).return: True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise.

params._from: - The wallet address of the owner.
params._value: - The total amount of tokens to transfer.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: True if the function executes successfully, false otherwise.

params._newOwner: - The address of the new owner.

allowance(address,address).notice: Allows anyone to query the token contract to see how many tokens an owner  of tokens has allowed a spender to spend from the owner's balance.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Allows an owner of tokens to approve some spender to spend up  to a specified amount of tokens from the owner's wallet address.

assignOwner(address).notice: Initializes the owner variable with an address (can only be invoked once).

balanceOf(address).notice: Allows anyone to query the balance of a given address.

burnTokens(uint256).notice: Allows the owner of the contract to burn tokens from the total supply  if and only if the token was declared as a burnable one in the constructor of the contract.

methods.constructor: Initializes the state variables of the token contract, assigns the owner to be  the address from which the transaction originated and also sends all tokens to  the owner.

getOwner().notice: Returns the ETH address of the owner of any contract which  inherits this contract.

mintTokens(address,uint256).notice: ALlows the owner of the contract to mint new tokens to any wallet  address if and only if the token was declared as a mintable one in  the constructor of the contract.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Allows token holders to tranfer their tokens to other ETH addresses.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Allows a spender who has been approved by an owner of the token to  spend tokens from the owner's wallet address.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows the current owner of the contract and all contracts  which inherit this contract to transfer ownership to another  ETH address. This function can only be invoked by the owner  of the contract.
